title: NodePort Service Practice
description: Deploy backend and frontend pods, expose backend via NodePort, and test internal and external connectivity in a Kubernetes cluster.

steps.title: Create Backend Deployment
steps.text: Apply backend-deploy.yaml to deploy nginx pods.

steps.title: Expose Backend via NodePort
steps.text: Apply backend-svc.yaml to expose backend pods on port 30080.

steps.title: Create Frontend Curl Pod
steps.text: Deploy curl client pod using frontend-deploy.yaml for internal testing.

steps.title: Access via NodePort
steps.text: Use node IP and port 30080 to test access from control plane.
